name: thirdeye
description: Two way chat between Discord and Minecraft Bedrock along with logs for Anticheats.

scripts.copy:assets: cp -R src/config.json src/Install_NodeJS_Modules.bat src/Run.bat src/whitelist.json LICENSE README.md build
scripts.build: npm run clean; ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json; npm run copy:assets
scripts.mkdir_win: @if exist build (rd /s /q build && mkdir build) else (mkdir build)
scripts.build_win: npm run clean_win && npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && node node_modules\typescript\bin\tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul
